response.job_title: MSc Data Science Student | Data Analyst | Data Scientist | Civil Engineer |
response.summary:
I am a Data Analyst and Data Scientist, graduated from Civil Engineering and studying a Master in Data Science, I have and advanced level of English and extensive knowledge in technologies such as Excel, Python, R, SQL, Power BI, DataStudio, AWS, Google Cloud Platform among others, I have 2 years of experience in computer development and database control, 6 months of experience as a community manager and more than 3 years of experience in the administrative area and customer service.

I am passionate about developing new skills daily in areas like Data Science, but also in other technologies such as Blockchain and digital marketing. Traveling is one of my biggest motivations, so that is why I study different languages so im might be able to share with people from all over the world.

I want to focus on the data industry because I am passionate about business and the best way to develop business strategies is by analyzing them. I also like challenges and I am very committed to my tasks, so I am good at working alone or as a team. I am looking for a company no matter if it is a Start-Up or Multinational Company, I just want to find a company where I can contribute with my knowledge in Business Intelligence and Machine learning to achieve the proposed objectives and generate great achievements.
response.skills: Análisis de datos estadísticos, Bases de datos, Análisis de negocio, Estrategia empresarial, Análisis de datos, Ciencia de datos, Aprendizaje supervisado, Algoritmos de aprendizaje automático, Inglés, Ingeniería, Comunicación, Estrategia, Investigación, Resolución de problemas, Marketing, Ventas, Gestión, Liderazgo de equipos, Francés, SQL

company.name: NielsenIQ
company.description:
NIQ is the world’s leading consumer intelligence company, delivering the most complete understanding of consumer buying behavior and revealing new pathways to growth. In 2023, NIQ combined with GfK, bringing together the two industry leaders with unparalleled global reach. With a holistic retail read and the most comprehensive consumer insights—delivered with advanced analytics through state-of-the-art platforms—NIQ delivers the Full View(TM).

NIQ, is an Advent International portfolio company with operations in 100+ markets, covering more than 90% of the world’s population. For more information, visit NIQ.com.
